SELECT SEQ_BOARD_RECOM.nextVal FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO MBS_BOARD_RECOM( BOARD_RECOM_NUM, BOARD_RECOM_TITLE, BOARD_RECOM_CONTENTS, BOARD_RECOM_DATE, PRO_MEM_NUM ) VALUES( #{boardRecomNum}, #{boardRecomTitle}, #{boardRecomContents}, #{boardRecomDate}, #{ProMemNum} )
mapper.update: UPDATE MBS_BOARD_RECOM SET BOARD_RECOM_NUM = #{boardRecomNum}, BOARD_RECOM_TITLE = #{boardRecomTitle}, BOARD_RECOM_CONTENTS = #{boardRecomContents}, BOARD_RECOM_DATE = #{boardRecomDate}, PRO_MEM_NUM = #{ProMemNum} WHERE BOARD_RECOM_NUM = #{boardRecomNum}
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_RECOM_NUM, BOARD_RECOM_TITLE, BOARD_RECOM_CONTENTS, BOARD_RECOM_DATE, P.PRO_MEM_PHONE_MID || P.PRO_MEM_PHONE_BACK, P.PRO_MEM_NUM FROM MBS_BOARD_RECOM B JOIN MBS_PRO_MEM P ON B.BOARD_RECOM_NUM = #{boardRecomNum} AND B.PRO_MEM_NUM = P.PRO_MEM_NUM
SELECT BOARD_RECOM_NUM, BOARD_RECOM_TITLE, P.PRO_MEM_PHONE_MID || P.PRO_MEM_PHONE_BACK, FROM MBS_BOARD_RECOM B JOIN MBS_PRO_MEM P ON B.PRO_MEM_NUM = P.PRO_MEM_NUM ORDER BY BOARD_RECOM_NUM DESC

SELECT BOARD_RECOM_NUM, BOARD_RECOM_TITLE, P.PRO_MEM_PHONE_MID || P.PRO_MEM_PHONE_BACK, IMG_FILE_NUM, IMG_FILE_USER, IMG_FILE_SERVER, IMG_FILE_EXT FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM, BOARD_RECOM_NUM, BOARD_RECOM_TITLE, P.PRO_MEM_PHONE_MID || P.PRO_MEM_PHONE_BACK, IMG_FILE_NUM, IMG_FILE_USER, IMG_FILE_SERVER, IMG_FILE_EXT FROM( SELECT B.BOARD_RECOM_NUM, BOARD_RECOM_TITLE, P.PRO_MEM_PHONE_MID || P.PRO_MEM_PHONE_BACK, F.IMG_FILE_NUM, F.IMG_FILE_USER, F.IMG_FILE_SERVER, F.IMG_FILE_EXT FROM MBS_BOARD_RECOM B JOIN MBS_PRO_MEM P ON B.PRO_MEM_NUM = P.PRO_MEM_NUM LEFT JOIN ( SELECT FILE_ID, NAME, UPLOAD_PATH, UUID, BOARD_ID FROM ( SELECT IMG_FILE_NUM, IMG_FILE_USER, IMG_FILE_SERVER, IMG_FILE_EXT, BOARD_RECOM_NUM, RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY BOARD_ID ORDER BY FILE_ID) RK FROM MBS_IMG_FILE ) WHERE RK = 1 ) F ON B.BOARD_RECOM_NUM = F.BOARD_RECOM_NUM ORDER BY BOARD_RECOM_NUM DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{page} * #{amount} ) WHERE RNUM > (#{page} - 1) * #{amount}
